root.name: Escape the Museum
root.description: Introduction Escape the Museum is a point and click adventure game developed by Gogii Games and released on both the Wii and PC. The game is set inside the National Museum of History shortly after an earthquake, seperating a woman, Susan Anderson, from her daughter Caitlin. Players must explore 12 areas, with 25 scenes altogether in the game, and using the Wii remote or a mouse, search the scenes to find hidden objects and solve puzzles in order to reunite Susan with Caitlin and escape from the museum. PC System Requirements: Minimum: Operating System: Windows XP / VistaCPU: 600MHz Intel Pentium 3 or equivalentRAM: 256MBDirectX: 9.0Keyboard and mouse Hard Drive: 101MB
